Uses of Interface
com.liferay.portletmvc4spring.multipart.MultipartActionRequest

  • Packages that use MultipartActionRequest 
    Package Description
    com.liferay.portletmvc4spring.multipart
    Multipart resolution framework for handling file uploads.

    • Uses of MultipartActionRequest in com.liferay.portletmvc4spring.multipart

      Classes in com.liferay.portletmvc4spring.multipart that implement MultipartActionRequest 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  DefaultMultipartActionRequest
      Default implementation of the MultipartActionRequest interface.
      Methods in com.liferay.portletmvc4spring.multipart that return MultipartActionRequest 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      MultipartActionRequest CommonsPortletMultipartResolver.resolveMultipart(javax.portlet.ActionRequest request) 
      MultipartActionRequest StandardPortletMultipartResolver.resolveMultipart(javax.portlet.ActionRequest actionRequest) 
      MultipartActionRequest PortletMultipartResolver.resolveMultipart(javax.portlet.ActionRequest request)
      Parse the given portlet request into multipart files and parameters, and wrap the request inside a MultipartActionRequest object that provides access to file descriptors and makes contained parameters accessible via the standard PortletRequest methods.
      Methods in com.liferay.portletmvc4spring.multipart with parameters of type MultipartActionRequest 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void CommonsPortletMultipartResolver.cleanupMultipart(MultipartActionRequest request) 
      void StandardPortletMultipartResolver.cleanupMultipart(MultipartActionRequest multipartActionRequest) 
      void PortletMultipartResolver.cleanupMultipart(MultipartActionRequest request)
      Cleanup any resources used for the multipart handling, such as storage for any uploaded file(s).
